resources.string: Ulak:First national base station project in Turkey.\nKEP:Secure electronic e-mail system.\nAtra:Web based reporting tool.

Versatile Software Engineer with about 10 years of hands-on experience including latest 3 years of experience leading teams through all phases of software development life cycle. Demonstrated expertise in analyzing and resolving technical issues to streamline functionality, improve quality, and enhance performance. Skilled in using technologies such as Java, Spring Boot, Spring MVC, Spring Cloud, Kafka, REST, Microservices, Docker, Kubernetes, PostgreSQL, Apache Tomcat, and Git.

Programming Languages: Java, PHP, C# 
 Frameworks / Technologies: Spring (Core), Spring Boot, Spring MVC, Spring Data, Spring Security, JSP, JSF, JPA (Hibernate, Toplink), JDBC, REST, SOAP, gRPC, Node.js, Zend Framework 
 Message Queue Technologies: Apache Kafka, Rabbit MQ, JMS 
 Middleware: Apache Tomcat, Apache HTTP Server, Glassfish Application Server 
 IDE: Eclipse, NetBeans, IntelliJ, Visual Studio 
 Source Control: Git, Subversion, CVS 
 Database: MySQL, Oracle, SQL Server, PostgreSQL, MongoDB 
 Client-Side: HTML, JavaScript, React.js, jQuery, CSS 
 Development Methodologies: Scrum, Kanban 
 Operating Systems: Linux (Centos), Windows 
 Issue - Project Tracking Software: Jira, Redmine, Confluence 
 Continuous Integration: Jenkins 
 Container Platform: Docker 
 Container Orchestration: Kubernetes 
 Other Tools: SOAP UI, Wireshark, Postman, Fiddler, iText, Apache POI

Versatile Software Engineer with about 10 years of hands-on experience including latest 3 years of experience leading teams through all phases of software development life cycle. Demonstrated expertise in analyzing and resolving technical issues to streamline functionality, improve quality, and enhance performance. Skilled in using technologies such as Java, Spring Boot, Spring MVC, Spring Cloud, Kafka, REST, Microservices, Docker, Kubernetes, PostgreSQL, Apache Tomcat, and Git.
Oracle Certified Professional: Java SE 11 Developer
Bachelors of Science in Computer Science
Master of Science in Computer Science
